title: STAVE THREE. â€” THE SECOND OF THE THREE SPIRITS.

scene_summary.description: Victorian London on Christmas morning and throughout the day, with scenes transitioning from Scrooge's transformed bedroom filled with festive greenery and food, to snowy city streets, to the humble Cratchit home, to various other locations including a desolate moor, a lighthouse, a ship at sea, and Fred's warm parlor.
